title_short: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 3 Avenida del Comercio

Nice place, with view of "Bahia de Cadiz" 
Near the skate park starts "The Salinas Santa Maria de Jesus route" in the same place is source of drinking water too. 
( water also running during corona time )  Not so far is a lot of shops, laundry, car services. I stayed 4 night with no problems

title: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 19 Carretera N340
title_short: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 19 Carretera N340

title_short: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera, Andalusia - 29 Carretera N340

title: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - Unnamed Road

name: Camping La Rana Verde

title_short: (11130) Camping La Rana Verde

title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 2 Camino Colada de Fuente Amarga

title: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 31B Camino Molino Viejo
title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 31B Camino Molino Viejo

title_short: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 46 Avenida Bahía de Algeciras

title: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 4 Camino del Cocotero
title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 4 Camino del Cocotero
description: Pine forest with shade to park day and night. The more in the background, the quieter. close to gas station, car wash, tire shop and WATER SOURCE.

title: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 1008 Lugar Pago Hoyo de la Espartosa
title_short: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 1008 Lugar Pago Hoyo de la Espartosa
description: Dirt car park with trees in the upper area of Pinar del Hierro, great views. In the pine forest there are children's games and picnic tables, there are also drinking fountains for dogs and people, although they are not prepared to drink water. There are no signs or signs prohibiting overnight stays. to spend a night it can be a good place. If you follow the GPS it will take you astray, to get to this place you must enter a dirt road that is after the roundabout of the El Florin restaurant in the direction of the motorway exit, it is the first road on the right, You have to continue to the height of the quarry and there to the left until the water tanks and next to them is the car park, it is very easy to get there with normal cars.

address.street: 1008 Lugar Pago Hoyo de la Espartosa

title: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 76 Camino Caño de Juan Cebada
title_short: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 76 Camino Caño de Juan Cebada

title_short: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 1103 Diseminado Pago Hoyo de la Espartosa
description: Drinking water.  At the Repsol gas station. There is also a table in the shade with a garbage where you can eat.

address.street: 1103 Diseminado Pago Hoyo de la Espartosa

title: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 1009 Lugar Pago Hoyo de la Espartosa
title_short: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - 1009 Lugar Pago Hoyo de la Espartosa

title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 2B Camino del Sotillo

title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 19 Camino Aldea del Coto

title_short: (11130)  - 244 Diseminado Pago la Espartina

title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 25 Calle Maracaibo

name: Casa Bosque
title: (11138) Casa Bosque
title_short: (11138) Casa Bosque
description: NLY FOR VANS, NOT CAMPER VANS. Contact before you come. 6 individual plots, with private space and shade, very quiet place in nature. A perfect place to relax, with hot showers, a covered relaxation area and a beautiful shared garden. Be part of our project focused on sustainability, respect for the environment and recycling,

title: (11100) San Fernando - 365 Camino de Gallineras
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 365 Camino de Gallineras
description: Picnic area inside a peri-urban park called the hill of the martyrs with paillote (beach bar) and areas to walk.

title: (11100) Puerto Real - 64 Calle de la Dorada
title_short: (11100) Puerto Real - 64 Calle de la Dorada

title: (11100) San Fernando - Avenida Manuel de Falla
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - Avenida Manuel de Falla
description: Flat land near the center. Quiet place to visit the city and spend the night. Car noise. In front there is another paved car park.

title: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera -

title: (11100) San Fernando - Zapatilla de Estero
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - Zapatilla de Estero
description: Large car park. view of the canal possible. very windy when we were there.

title: (11100) San Fernando - Av. Ronda del Estero
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - Av. Ronda del Estero
description: San Fernando fairground car park. Large unpaved esplanade 10 minutes from Calle Real. Right next to it begins the Carrascón path, a pedestrian and cycle path. Attention to the holes in the lot.

title: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 135 Calle Viña del Mar
title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 135 Calle Viña del Mar
description: Parking with large spaces very close to Chiclana beach. In the middle of August park us without problems. It is in a neighborhood but there are people who park in the pine forest. we slept well

title: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera -
title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera -
description: Public showers and toilets

title: (11100) San Fernando - 1 Calle Cartageneras
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 1 Calle Cartageneras
description: Here is free parking, gym access and showers. Good spot, Dia maxi market right next to the gym.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 43-5 Calle Francisco Ruiz Miguel
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 43-5 Calle Francisco Ruiz Miguel
description: Parking to visit the center, is the level of the Fair and the market on Thursdays. Next to the local police. Without services of any kind. Be careful at exit 11 that there is a height limitation to 2.75 ,. EXIT 11 AND THEN LEFT We recommend eating at Bar La Pastora. (Photo)

title: (11100) San Fernando - 26 Calle Francisco Ruiz Miguel
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 26 Calle Francisco Ruiz Miguel
description: It is a spacious place to park and spend the night. The city center is a ten-minute walk away, there is a gas station, a few meters away, where it is possible to stock up on drinking water.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 30A Calle Almirante Cervera
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 30A Calle Almirante Cervera
description: Open blue automatic laundry. Laundry from 7-23h. Very close to the fairground car park n° 12, where you can kill time while your clothes are washed. And two steps from the center.

title: (11100) San Fernando -
title_short: (11100) San Fernando -
description: At the end of the beach avenue, an earthen car park with direct access to the hiking trail through the reserve and access to the beach right at the entrance to the car park. beach with shower and WC. quieter than the other parking lots.

title: (11100) San Fernando - numero 10 Calle Colegio Naval Sacramento
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - numero 10 Calle Colegio Naval Sacramento

title: (11100) San Fernando - 8 Calle Montigny

title_short: (11100) San Fernando - Avenida Almirante León Herrero

title: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
description: Area to park and spend the night. It is a long paved line on the road next to the sea, with several toilets and showers on the beach. Please note: it is very windy both during the day and at night.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 5 Calle Charrán
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 5 Calle Charrán
description: Parking area in urbanisation

title: (11100) San Fernando - 9999 Avenida Poeta Rafael Alberti
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 9999 Avenida Poeta Rafael Alberti
description: Great place to park and spend the night, it has a beautiful park to walk with pets. It does not have any service, but there is a supermarket and 50 meters away there are several restaurant terraces to be able to have any aperitif or eat well and cheaply. Very quiet and safe place.

title: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - Ctra. de la Barrosa
title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - Ctra. de la Barrosa
description: Parking on the sides of Ctra. de la Barrosa. Spaces large enough to park, since they are along the road.

title: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 41 Avenida Octavio Augusto
title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 41 Avenida Octavio Augusto
description: Public drinking water tap. running 24 hours.

title: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
description: Large car park, 2 minutes walk from the beach. Quiet and safe for the night. There are showers and toilets on the beach (in summer).

title: (11100) Puerto Real - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11100) Puerto Real - Unnamed Road
description: Good place to sleep next to the sea. Very quiet night and with services nearby.

title: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera, Andalusia - 5D Avenida Octavio Augusto
title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera, Andalusia - 5D Avenida Octavio Augusto
description: Parking in a good tourist area, flat terrain, quiet. water source 50 meters. Parking allowed, no camping. Close to the beach, 15min walk or 5min by bike.

title: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the beginning of Camposoto beach. We stayed here for fear that sleeping in front of the beach would cause us problems. Very quiet, no wind and no mosquitoes. The beach toilets are next door.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 23 Carretera de la Batería de la Ardila
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 23 Carretera de la Batería de la Ardila
description:
Parking sand hard, many lovers come to admire the sunset in this beautiful place. As it is right next to the road and gives a beautiful view it is not the most quiet.
Definitely nice to go for a walk though.

address.street: 23 Carretera de la Batería de la Ardila

title: (11100) San Fernando - 31 Avenida Almirante J M Pery Junquera
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 31 Avenida Almirante J M Pery Junquera
description: Water point with small thread tap, in the GP service station just after the washing rolls. The faucet is leaking but the flow is correct.

address.street: 31 Avenida Almirante J M Pery Junquera

title: (11130) Urbanización Novo Santi Petri - 19 Calle Altamar
title_short: (11130) Urbanización Novo Santi Petri - 19 Calle Altamar
description: LACOLADA laundromat, 5 euros for 12 kg, 6 euros for 16 kg. drying 2 e every 15 min. very clean. large parking nearby

title: (11100) San Fernando - 3A Calle Carpinteros
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 3A Calle Carpinteros
description: Parking next to the Bahía Sur shopping center and next to the sports facilities. Quiet although somewhat noisy. Good for a night

title: (11100) San Fernando -
title_short: (11100) San Fernando -
description: Public parking in the upper part of the Bahia Sur shopping center in San Fernando, just on the ground floor, restaurants, supermarkets, and just 50 meters away from a walk with views of the city of Cádiz, very quiet and quite spacious, highly recommended for an overnight stay.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 4 Paseo Virgen del Rocío
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 4 Paseo Virgen del Rocío
description: Free parking in front of shopping center. Entry for parking In the end of the streat. The first entry have a limit of 2.2m and the other dont have!

title: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - Avenida de la Gran Bretaña
title_short: (11130) Chiclana de la Frontera - Avenida de la Gran Bretaña
description: Public source of drinking water recharge only water, do not throw garbage or change water.

title: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 195 Poligono Loma del Puerco
title_short: (11139) Chiclana de la Frontera - 195 Poligono Loma del Puerco
description: Quiet place to park during the day and at night, next to pine forests, plenty of room. Nearby there is a shopping center with bars, supermarket. The beach is close.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 10 Calle Santo Ángel
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 10 Calle Santo Ángel
description: Place to spend day and night motorhome

title: (11100) San Fernando - 999 Carretera Polvorines de Militares
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 999 Carretera Polvorines de Militares
description:
Nice landscape, quiet area, weekends and with good weather very crowded by the 2 restaurants that are in the area, ideal area for paddle surfing.
It is a good car park in case you are passing by to eat or spend the morning, but not to spend more time

title: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - Unnamed Road
description: It is an esplanade in front of the Yacht Club on La Casería beach, with a capacity of at least 10 AC. It is illuminated at night by street lighting. There is a children's playground next door. The views over the bay are worth it. At 100 m is the WC module of the beach. The toilets are locked, but outside there are the typical showers to wash off the sand from your feet. There are two very nice restaurants to dine on fish and other seafood.

title: (11100) San Fernando - 53 Calle Magallanes
title_short: (11100) San Fernando - 53 Calle Magallanes
description: LA CASERIA BEACH. Quiet and perfect place to spend the day and spend the night. There is a small fishing village but it is uninhabited and there are also restaurants next door where you can eat good fish from the land. Quiet place to spend the day and pecnotate, next to a restaurant to eat well and at a good price

name: Casachanita
title: (11149) Casachanita
title_short: (11149) Casachanita
description: Space for overnight caravans, motorhomes and campervans on the Novo Sancti Petri road in the municipality of Conil de la Frontera, with common services of barbecue, swimming pool, toilet, light and outdoor shower, emptying of gray and black water

title: (11149) Roche - C. de la Barrosa
title_short: (11149) Roche - C. de la Barrosa
description: It is a very large land adjacent to the road, from which you can reach the sea through the dunes. Very comfortable and quiet.

title: (11149) Barrio Nuevo - 124D Diseminado Barrio Nuevo
title_short: (11149) Barrio Nuevo - 124D Diseminado Barrio Nuevo
description: Repsol service station, has a water tap

title: (11011) Cádiz - Avenida Vía Augusta Julia
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - Avenida Vía Augusta Julia
description: (July 2023) Great beach. Lots of space for campers. Please note when entering the parking lot, there is no exit lane from the 90 road, but you must turn immediately. The toilets are open during the day. To go somewhere you need a car / camper, walking or cycling is not possible. Let's keep this place clean and don't leave trash in the dunes. There are plenty of trash cans available.

title: (11170) Chiclana de la Frontera -
title_short: (11170) Chiclana de la Frontera -
description: Former lime quarry of El Berrueco. Follow the sign El Berrueco 2km (see photo): it's a dirt road with beautiful potholes but with a little patience there is no problem, even for a large vehicle. Absolute tranquility! On the other hand, for those who cannot do without a network... go your way! ;-) Please keep this place clean.

title: (11510) Puerto Real - Carretera de Circunvalación
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - Carretera de Circunvalación
description: Wide parking area very close to the highway. Very flat, there is a supermarket and a bar very close. There is a path that can be done by bicycle or on foot that communicates with San Fernando

title: (11149) Roche -
description: Quiet and clean place half sun half shade

title: (11170) - 39 Urbanizacion Berrueco
title_short: (11170)  - 39 Urbanizacion Berrueco
description: Quiet place, surrounded by nature, where to spend the night. You also have the possibility that they carry out REPAIRS, and give you a solution to your problem on the trip.

title: (11510) Puerto Real - 27D Calle Séneca
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - 27D Calle Séneca
description:
Nice parking, next to medical center. Very calm at night. There is shadow from 6 pm next to the bush.
People don't mind as long as you keep place clean and don't park on the disabled path(next to the building).
Little bar, in the front. You can use the bathroom there.

title: (11510) Puerto Real - 3 Calle Concepción
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - 3 Calle Concepción
description: Parking with faucets, centrally located on the same promenade next to a small beach that has water with tides ideal for visiting and eating for its bars, has a beach bar right next to the spectacular spa and toilet, although it is necessary to wait for the afternoon to erase the parking

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 15B Monaco
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 15B Monaco
description: Parking roche beach

title: (11510) El Pinar - 6D Paseo Marítimo
title_short: (11510) El Pinar - 6D Paseo Marítimo
description: Free parking day and night, quiet area, I sleep even with the van door open .. it's next to a small beach that has everything to please ... here there is always room

title: (11149) - 999 Diseminado Roche Viejo
title_short: (11149)  - 999 Diseminado Roche Viejo
description: Entrance on the way to the hunting ground. In the middle of nature although in the middle of a bike path. Very calm

name: Camping Roche
title: (11149) Camping Roche
title_short: (11149) Camping Roche
description: Camping Roche in the pine forest. The pitches for caravans and motorhomes are flat and wide.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Carril de Pilahito 3
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Carril de Pilahito 3
description: Beautiful horse finca in the middle of the pine forest. A magical spot for people who love being in nature with animals. You will have the chance to get in touch with our horses, dogs, cats and chickens. People who would love to ride have the chance to book a lesson. We are still building our place and would be happy to share it with you. We have Wifi, a shower in the forest and a separating toilet (to save water). Also you can use the outside kitchen for cooking or dishwashing. Looking forward to see you soon! Please contact us via phone (WhatsApp) for availability.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - CA-4202
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - CA-4202
description: Parking near the coves of Conil. We have been without problems for a couple of days.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 8 Calle Algodonales
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 8 Calle Algodonales
description: Very quiet cul-de-sac parking, fair spaces

title: (11510) Puerto Real - 11 Avenida de Méjico
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - 11 Avenida de Méjico
description: Laundry with 3 washing machines and 2 dryers

name: Conil rural campsite
title: (11149) Conil rural campsite
title_short: (11149) Conil rural campsite
description: Conil rural campsite, quiet, lots of shade, large and clean pitches, pleasant staff. Basic bar, shop without fresh products or bread, no eggs or milk etc. Pool could improve. a lot of noise, they allow loud music at all hours. nothing for children, no park or activities

title: (11149) Roche - Unnamed road
title_short: (11149) Roche - Unnamed road
description: Parking at the foot of the road next to the entrance to the Cala del Pato. Wooden path that reaches the stairs to go down to the cove, there are two more coves also with stairs. They ask you for one euro to park, we asked the girl who the money was for since we saw that they were identified with a card and she explained that they are a social project, the contribution is VOLUNTARY, they give you a ticket with all the data, like this that for this time I gave the euro.

title: (11510) Puerto Real - 9 Paseo de María Auxiliadora
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - 9 Paseo de María Auxiliadora
description:
A car park with services in the area, a few minutes away you can visit the city and make a route around the bay.
The zone is the one used on the day of the city fair.

Approximately in the middle of the parking lot there is a building block with 4 drinking water taps.

In summer you have to pay attention to the sprayed "toilet" to fill up the water. There are all services. A connection with an external thread is required for water.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 595 Avenida Vía Augusta Julia
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 595 Avenida Vía Augusta Julia
description: Many places (about thirty) at the entrance to the peninsula. Very practical to deposit the CC and leave immediately. Repsol station 1km away for all services. City center easily accessible by bike thanks to the cycle paths present from the start.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 19 Avenida Ronda de Vigilancia
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 19 Avenida Ronda de Vigilancia
description: It is a car park in a polygon area, with private surveillance and great views. In summer perhaps with an influx of young people but very tran6em winter during the week. Near the ITV you are at the foot of the rocky beach but to take a dip it is fine

name: Camping El Faro
title: (11149) Camping El Faro
title_short: (11149) Camping El Faro
description: CAMPING LIGHTHOUSE. 3* Large campsite with many pitches of various sizes. Swimming pool, supermarket, children's area and entertainment (in season) and paddle tennis courts. Possibility to grill. Vehicle washing area. Street with access to the beach 10 minutes walk. Shady pitches separated by hedges, most with grass. They accept pets that are not considered dangerous breeds. Close to hiking and mountain biking trails. Card/cash payment. Sanitary facilities are very clean and well maintained. Beach very far away on foot. 600 m. Beach Bar. Very friendly service. The pool is very clean and pleasantly warm.

title: (11011) Cádiz - Calle Adelfa
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - Calle Adelfa
description:
Parking behind a school. In Carnival there were many housing vehicles. Due to the height difference with the road, it is quite quiet and the squares are very level. Five minutes away is the urban bus 1. On the day that there were more vehicles, an informal man with a yellow vest appeared who I suppose was asking for money (a gorilla), but he did not approach us.


In a quiet place and it gave me a feeling of security.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 8 Av. Alcalde Sánchez Cossío
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 8 Av. Alcalde Sánchez Cossío
description: Place along the road. the places being all taken on the other park4night car park we continued and found this location with plenty of space available and a bus stop right in front which allows you to take line 5 to the center.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 1516 Calle Puerto Real
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 1516 Calle Puerto Real
description: Parking place where you can leave the motorhome for an indefinite time. It is not guarded, but it is a place where theft does not appear to occur, at least not until now.

title: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - 15 Calle Paraguay
title_short: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - 15 Calle Paraguay
description: Place next to the beach to spend the night. Frequented by fishermen during the evening, discreet. Along a road with some traffic at night (not much noise). There are showers and fountain, currently closed. There is a nice long walk where people exercise, bike, walk dogs. Beautiful sunsets with views of Cádiz.

title: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - 5 Calle Paraguay
title_short: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - 5 Calle Paraguay

title: (11011) Cádiz - Calle Adelfa
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - Calle Adelfa
description: Unpaved Splanada we have slept without any problem. It is an alternative to the parking lot if the police do not allow you to sleep or it is full. very quiet space, we spent the night phenomenal.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - CA-4202
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - CA-4202

title: (11011) Cádiz -
description: Hemegas self-service station. Free in case of refueling more than 50€

title: (11149) - 98 Diseminado Roche Viejo
title_short: (11149)  - 98 Diseminado Roche Viejo

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - CA-4202

title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - 80 Ctra.Portal -Genaro
description: CAMP Finca Villa Zaar CASAS. Motorhome area with all its services. The price of the plot includes Motorhome 2 Adults 1 Child Pet Electricity Drinking water Showers with hot water Emptying the WC tank. Free access to the pool, within the limit of the capacity of the Bungalows and Apartments.

name: Camping Fuente Del Gallo, S.L.
title: (11149) Camping Fuente Del Gallo, S.L.
title_short: (11149) Camping Fuente Del Gallo, S.L.
description: Camping Fuente Del Gallo, 300 meters from the sea, 2 kms from the city center, it has a swimming pool, bar-restaurant, supermarket, laundry and a car wash and emptying station for vehicles. The reception of the camp-site is very average, the alleys are a little narrow according to the size of a camper. There is the advantage of a bus stop 200 meters to the city center.

title: (11011) Cádiz - D Avenida Alcalde Manuel de la Pinta
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - D Avenida Alcalde Manuel de la Pinta

title: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11519) Barriada Río San Pedro - Unnamed Road
description: Parking under the Pepa bridge, next to a factory. I put this car park especially for the beach that is following the path where dogs are allowed. The coordinates of the access to the beach are (36.5283057, -6.2431275). Remember to keep the place clean and take your pets' droppings with you. Possibility of fishing too.

title: (11011) Cádiz - 37 Avenida Ronda de Vigilancia
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 37 Avenida Ronda de Vigilancia
description: Large parking lot next to mechanical workshops (ADACCA) Fairly flat earth parking lot not far from Mercadona. Entrance a bit tight but great place afterwards. There is a lavender shop not far away at 26 avenida Marconi...

title: (11011) Cádiz - 14 Plaza Virgen de Loreto
title_short: (11011) Cádiz - 14 Plaza Virgen de Loreto
description: Small laundry called OpenBlue with 2 washing machines (15 & 19kg) and 2 dryers (19kg). Place is clean and owner very friendly. You can also bring your own detergent if you want. The owner even rinsed the machines beforehand so that the smell of the normal detergent and softeners is gone.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Avenida de Extremadura
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Avenida de Extremadura
description: Parking area at the end of a street with access to the beach, I have been in December at this time of year it is a quiet area

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 19 Avenida de Extremadura
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 19 Avenida de Extremadura

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 5 Avenida de Extremadura
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 5 Avenida de Extremadura

title: (11510) Puerto Real - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - Unnamed Road

title: () Barrio Nuevo -

title: (11009) Cádiz - 26 Avenida Marconi
title_short: (11009) Cádiz - 26 Avenida Marconi

name: Camping La Rosaleda
title: (11149) Camping La Rosaleda
title_short: (11149) Camping La Rosaleda
description: Terraced campsite with mainly level pitches. ACSII card accepted

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Autovía de la Luz
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Autovía de la Luz
description: Sewage drainage area. For residual water, you have to empty it with a bucket, or use the car wash channel, but whose height is limited to 2.90 m. For water, the faucet handle has been removed. There is another area in the direction of Algeciras. Bathrooms open to the public with shower.

title: (11510) Puerto Real - CA-3113
title_short: (11510) Puerto Real - CA-3113
description: Large picnic area, with tables and barbecues. Easy access even to large motorhomes. No problem to stay the night, the guarda civil makes several rounds a day. Do not hesitate to move forward on the path to get away from the road a little. Possibility to get in the shade towards the bottom of the area, under the tall pines, or in the sun in the first very wide part, depending on the season. Very quiet at night. Animated during the day on weekends. No service. Garbage cans and a glass dumpster are available at the entrance. Please leave the premises clean.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Avenida Fuente del Gallo, 5
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Avenida Fuente del Gallo, 5
description: Private plot for parking and overnight for motorhomes at the moment only electricity and water service, no drainage. Quiet plot to rest.

title: (11009) Cádiz - 4 Avenida María Auxiliadora
title_short: (11009) Cádiz - 4 Avenida María Auxiliadora
description: The edge of the beach has become completely chargeable; it is the only place 100m from the beach and 10 minutes by bike from the old center to be free… about twenty parking spaces without noise at night. For vans only.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 2 Arrabal Urb Ply Roqueo
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 2 Arrabal Urb Ply Roqueo

title_short: (11140) Camping Eucalyptus

title: (11009) Cádiz - 22 Avenida Amílcar Barca
title_short: (11009) Cádiz - 22 Avenida Amílcar Barca
description: Level parking. Opposite there is a footpath, a cycle path, a promenade and the beach. 30 min walk from Cadiz Cathedral and its center. Bars and restaurants nearby. No service. Shower 300m in each direction of the beach.

title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 52 Avenida de la Libertad

title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 10B Avenida de la Música

title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 15X Avenida de la Música

title_short: (11140) Cádiz - 3F Camino Chiclana

title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 32 Avenida de los Agricultores
description: Speedy Wash self-service laundromat with 2 washing machines (10kg & 17kg) and 2 dryers (12kg & 18kg). Payment by credit card and smartphone possible. Parking spaces for mobile homes are available, as it is in the industrial area.

title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - C. Josefina Aldecoa

Snacks & drinks machine available with seating & laundry baskets and table. Parking nearby on wasteland opposite Burger King & next to Aldi

title: (11008) Cádiz - 52 Avenida Andalucía
title_short: (11008) Cádiz - 52 Avenida Andalucía

title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 5Z Avenida de la Música

title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1D Calle del Turismo

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Calle María Zambrano
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Calle María Zambrano
description: Large municipal dirt car park, with a slight slope, easy access and well located for visiting Conil, and there is no street market on Fridays, as in other nearby car parks

title: (11007) Cádiz - 1 Brunete
title_short: (11007) Cádiz - 1 Brunete
description:
15 minutes from the old center.
Free place, we stayed there all day.
More suitable for a van, as the street is not hugely wide.

title: (11008) Cádiz - 5C Avenida Fernández Ladreda
title_short: (11008) Cádiz - 5C Avenida Fernández Ladreda
description: Blue zone parking 9am-9pm right on the beach. Max 3 hours.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 19 Calle Laguna
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 19 Calle Laguna
description: Very clean and good machines! I can only recommend!

title: (11158) Los Naveros - 7 Calle Nueva
title_short: (11158) Los Naveros - 7 Calle Nueva

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 6 Calle Olvera
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 6 Calle Olvera
description: Flat place, very quiet, near the center, quite spacious and with little traffic, we spent a couple of nights in summer quietly and without problems, free of charge. It does not have services of any kind, it looks like school deterrent parking.

title: (11008) Cádiz - 4 Calle Virgen del Perpetuo Socorro
title_short: (11008) Cádiz - 4 Calle Virgen del Perpetuo Socorro
description: Free parking along this street and in the area. You get to the center immediately and being next to the gas station there was always someone attentive.

title: (11007) Cádiz - 2 Plaza de la Constitución
title_short: (11007) Cádiz - 2 Plaza de la Constitución
description: Parking very close to the door allowing access to the historic center of Cadiz (10m walk). noise from the road next door but not too loud either. Paying from Monday to Friday from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. and a maximum of 3 hours in a row (blue zone).

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 40 Calle Pascual Junquera
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 40 Calle Pascual Junquera
description: Hardware store that replaces small gas cylinders, camping-gas type. Very practical!

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1A Calle Alcalá del Valle
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1A Calle Alcalá del Valle
description: Public dirt parking lot, bumpy, crowded and noisy, people come after the party and make noise, also people early to leave the car and between each other... you don't sleep much, but in Conil there is little else to park ...

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 24 Calle la Peñita
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 24 Calle la Peñita
description: Parking very close to the center of Conil. You can park vans and AC without problem. Site for about 30 vehicles. Quiet area but without services although they have shops quite close on foot.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 7 Calle Almadraba
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 7 Calle Almadraba
description: Drinking water fountain in front of the entrance to the municipal library of Conil. There is also parking (on land) where you can stop next to the fountain and fill your tank with bottles. The faucet does not have a thread for adapters. ps: in Oct.2022 the street area is undergoing renovations and improvements, so to access the car park you have to enter through Antonio Piné street. almost reaching the intersection with Almadraba street.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Avenida del Río
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Avenida del Río
description: Water source

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 46 Paseo Marítimo
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 46 Paseo Marítimo
description: Parking lot along the street. Next to the park. No prohibition signs that I saw. Large bins for sorted rubbish. beach shower. For us it was just a stopover and didn't stay overnight.

title: () Cádiz - Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
title_short: () Cádiz - Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
description: Parking in the port of Cadiz (Punta San Felipe). 10 minutes from the center by bike. No problem staying overnight. There is a chiringuito that offers luxury dining and has bathrooms outside (open during chiringuito hours)

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 1B Calle del Litoral
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 1B Calle del Litoral
description: Parking free for all types of vehicles. No services. Good for visiting the beach, quiet and tranquil for the night but expect to be on your own.

title: (11006) Cádiz - 6 Avenida Generalísimo
title_short: (11006) Cádiz - 6 Avenida Generalísimo
description: Parking entrándo en el puerto junto al gimnasio fórus perfecto para visitar cadiz. Hemos llegado para ver la finalización de la regata de grandes veleros. Y este parking está ubicado justo al lado del evento.

title: (11002) Cádiz - 22I Avenida Campo del Sur
title_short: (11002) Cádiz - 22I Avenida Campo del Sur
description: Because all the parking lots were far from the center, we decided to park here. It is an avenue with views of the sea and blue zone (for a fee). We parked for the night and we had no problem sleeping there. In the morning we took out the time ticket and enjoyed Cádiz since we had the Cathedral only 5 min away.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 32 Avenida del Mar
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 32 Avenida del Mar
description: Parking in front of the entrance to Los Toruños Park, place for walking, cycling with children. Quiet at night and with visits to the park during the day. It's worth a weekend here. Without services although in the visitor center there are toilets and a bar.

title: (11004) Cádiz - 4 Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
title_short: (11004) Cádiz - 4 Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
description: Parking open 24 hours a day and monitored in the port area. No services. Very advantageous motorhome rate for 24 hours (note that vans, vans and other converted vehicles are excluded). If the motorhome occupies 2 places, the price is doubled. Very tight right angle turn at the access barrier. Please note: very noisy disco evening from Saturday to Sunday, all night long.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 53A Avenida Río San Pedro
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 53A Avenida Río San Pedro
description: Good parking in Valdelagrana, in a quiet and wide avenue. Here we go more unnoticed than in the parking bags on the beach. It is better to park here, it is 200m from the beach, but the place is very quiet and spacious. school, nobody is bothered here parked. In the surrounding streets there are also AC parked. As I say, better around here than in the first line to go unnoticed.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2 Calle de la Luz
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2 Calle de la Luz
description: Good parking to spend the night, quiet and on the beachfront. There is ample parking on the sides, to leave the AC. In the background, facing the sea, there are large squares as well. Gratuitous.

title: (11004) Cádiz - 25 Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
title_short: (11004) Cádiz - 25 Paseo Almirante Pascual Pery
description: Ideal car park for overnight stays, except on the eve of bank holidays (bottle). Regulated by parameters from 9am to 9pm Monday to Sunday. Maximum 3 hours. 6m vehicle length is officially too long, since the rear is already on the pavement and the front is on the road! Unfortunately very disturbing as disco visitors were active until the morning and 5am

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2 Calle la Playa
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2 Calle la Playa
description:
Lots of space but not very nice. it's close to a lot of things but right inbetween high building compound.
Free parking with plenty of space. On weekends it is quite full, during the week there is no problem. On the beachfront with many bars and various services. The area is quite safe. Dogs are not allowed in this beach of Valdelagrana. The police does not put a problem but please take care of the site, do not use chairs or awning to keep coming without problems.

title: (11002) San Jose - 6 Avenida Duque de Nájera
title_short: (11002) San Jose - 6 Avenida Duque de Nájera
description: The best placed paid park in the city. 24 hour security. In front of the beach. Come at night because it gets full. Near city center on foot, near the beach and good place to park in windy days. Tv is not very good. No pets area!

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place behind the popular gardens of Medina Sidonia to camp high up and away from traffic (which you can hear from afar). Access by a sloping unpaved road full of ruts, not passable in rainy weather (unless you are a 4x4 pro or you are traveling with your enduro / mountain bike). It also doesn't seem very accessible for large units, even if there is space once on site. Icing on the cake: for the moment there is no waste here so thank you for keeping it that way!

title: (11002) Cádiz - 7 Avenida Duque de Nájera
title_short: (11002) Cádiz - 7 Avenida Duque de Nájera
description: Cadiz City Council public showers open from June to September. Schedules see photo

title: (11002) Cádiz - 88 Calle Benito Pérez Galdós
title_short: (11002) Cádiz - 88 Calle Benito Pérez Galdós
description: Underground parking, 2.3 meters max

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - Camino de Uso Agricola
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - Camino de Uso Agricola
description: Several locations possible, between a road not too busy and a fenced field in the shade. Nearby restaurants and a pretty village. Quiet night.

title: (11002) Cádiz - 5 Calle Campo de las Balas
title_short: (11002) Cádiz - 5 Calle Campo de las Balas
description:
Day and night parking
in Cadiz

title: (11002) Cádiz - 5A Calle Campo de las Balas
title_short: (11002) Cádiz - 5A Calle Campo de las Balas
description: Parking at the end of the island at the castle with a magnificent view of the ocean and the Sans Sebastia castle. Very expensive, no service, only guarded parking. Showers with free hot water are available on the beach.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 33 Calle Bahía
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 33 Calle Bahía
description: Great laundry room

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 46 Avenida Catalina Santos la Guachi
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 46 Avenida Catalina Santos la Guachi
description: Parking right on the beach next to a restaurant. Beach showers nearby. Spent the night without problems, Guardia Civil passed several times without any problems. Quiet and close to shops.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 1 Calle la Gomera
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 1 Calle la Gomera
description: Gas station with dispenser for fresh water.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 1 Paseo Marítimo de la Puntilla
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 1 Paseo Marítimo de la Puntilla
description: Parking next to the beach. You can stay overnight without problem. quite noisy at the weekend because the youth goes to make a bottle. On Sunday there is "feria" right next to

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 92-96 Paseo del Poeta Jose Luis Tejada
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 92-96 Paseo del Poeta Jose Luis Tejada
description: A massive parking area on the edge of the beach. Good hard standing and partially paved. There is no beach access for a dog but fortunately there is a launching ramp that is used by all the locals to cool off their dogs. I had a lovely quiet night here.

address.street: 92-96 Paseo del Poeta Jose Luis Tejada

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 56 Calle Tejar
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 56 Calle Tejar
description: Esplanade of the land used for parking. Useful to visit the city and spend the night.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 35 Calle Puerto Serrano
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 35 Calle Puerto Serrano
description: Large area for parking and spending the day on the port quay. Better to park at the end because the spaces are more spacious. Very quiet and with a few restaurants just up the stairs. Entering is done at the beginning of the port.

title: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - Unnamed Road / Estación Servicio Alegría
title_short: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - Unnamed Road / Estación Servicio Alegría

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 13 Calle Barbate
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 13 Calle Barbate
description: Lonely parking, only a few dog walkers in the morning. We were alone in total tranquility, next to the cemetery

title: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - A-381
title_short: (11400) Jerez de la Frontera - A-381
description:
Restaurant service station, sink, showers, WC, parking and gas station, very good music, bakery 24/24.
The car park is not so noisy. For showers you can get the key in the restaurant. At the restaurant the food is excellent.  There is water also. Wifi free and excellent.

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 14P Avenida del Atlántico
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 14P Avenida del Atlántico
description: 2 flat car parks one tarred and marked on the ground the other underneath chippings unmarked places were first went to that a little higher and left cars skidding. On gravel and sloping we changed and found this quiet place .

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 66 Avenida de la Bajamar
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 66 Avenida de la Bajamar
description: Parking along one-way street no prohibition signs ideal for taking the bus or boat to Cadiz

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 61 Calle Aurora
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 61 Calle Aurora
description: One-way street, wide, with parking on the sides. Next to a playground.

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 1 Calle Cigarra
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 1 Calle Cigarra
description: It is a public car park with an access and dirt car park and a large slope except at the exit. Due to the narrowness of the street, it is not suitable for AC and very long Campers (ours of 6 meters entered with maneuvers). It is free and there were no gorillas. It is very central for visiting the city.

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 47 Plaza del Punto
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 47 Plaza del Punto
description: Petrol station happy to let us have drinking water from a hose housed in their air/water point. We did buy fuel.

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 2 Calle Vejer
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 2 Calle Vejer
description: A large car park next to the cemetery and near the center

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 9 Calle Puerto Serrano
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 9 Calle Puerto Serrano
description: Site Dunas de San Anton: Nice parking facing the sea, with nice beach. Can accept large motorhomes (7.5 m). Bike path accessible from the left of the car park by a slope or steps.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 45 Calle Aurora
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 45 Calle Aurora
description: Battery parking, up to 6m long,

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 4 Plaza Sánchez Romate
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 4 Plaza Sánchez Romate
description: Quiet during the day, although there are several bars nearby. It's a parking lot, it's very crowded, arrive early or late. I don't know I can get anything.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - P.º Marítimo de la Puntilla
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - P.º Marítimo de la Puntilla
description: In front of the beach. showers on the beach and next to it there is a bar that opens at 10 for breakfast and going to the bathroom if required, next to it is a campsite and a supermarket.

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 13 Calle Alcalá
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 13 Calle Alcalá
description: La Pedrera car park. Near the center, perfect for visiting the city, perfect for AC, quiet and pleasant place, it is not crowded in summer.

name: Camping las dunas
title: (11500) Camping las dunas
title_short: (11500) Camping las dunas
description:
Nice campsite near the beach. ACSI 22 euros per day including electricity. Sufficient and clean sanitary facilities. Friendly staff. Trash cans everywhere. Gray and black water in only 2 spots so a walk at times. Lots of water points. sandy surface. Storage shop and swimming pool open only in high season. good value for money. nice terrace next to the entrance, we good at the price but ok...
36€ Van 13€ Electricity 04/23

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 5 Calle Portería
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 5 Calle Portería
description: Quiet place with spectacular views, we spent the night without any problem

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 94 Avenida de la Muralla
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 94 Avenida de la Muralla
description: Great place on a beautiful sandy beach. Parking under trees available. Several restaurants along the beach. Beach shower and toilet available. Toilet has defined opening hours (see notice on site). It is best to get a parking space here very early or in the evening, as it is heavily occupied by bathers.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2D Calle Federico Chueca
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 2D Calle Federico Chueca
description:
Modern laundry and tumble dryer.

garbage, supermarket across the street and a sewer hole on the parking you could use to dump some grey water.

title: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 176 Lugar Toril de la Ciudad
title_short: (11170) Medina-Sidonia - 176 Lugar Toril de la Ciudad
description: Place in the middle of nature, only 2 minutes from Medina Sidonia, it looks like an old parking lot, with limited spaces, not too clean it seems that the locals frequent it sometimes, but of all those in Medina it is the one that I liked the most, I have peaceful sleep only with animal sounds.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - Avenida de Europa
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - Avenida de Europa
description: Parking monitored 24 hours a day, paying. It has no services. The gas station nearby allows you to empty and water if you fill up. Excellent location for visiting the city. Access by the roundabout where the Burger King is located.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 305 Calle Pítágoras
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 305 Calle Pítágoras
description: Parking in an industrial estate. There is not much industry and there is a lot of parking. Right in front there are trails to walk through Las Salinas and Río Guadalete

name: Camping Medina Sidonia
title: (11170) Camping Medina Sidonia
title_short: (11170) Camping Medina Sidonia
description: Camping, Medina Sidonia bungalows. Kindness on all four sides, very attentive and doing great.

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 45 Calle Bergantín
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 45 Calle Bergantín
description: Great place next to the sea. Maybe try to avoid weekends (loud people) and high season (too crowded).

title: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 21D Calle Valdés
title_short: (11500) El Puerto de Santa María - 21D Calle Valdés
description: Washers and dryers in perfect condition. Capacities of 12, 15 and 21 kg. The dryers are 14 and 21 kgs. Open from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.
